data.name: Watermark.GamePath
data.comment: Placeholder for game path input

data.name: Watermark.DefaultPlatform
data.comment: Placeholder for platform-dependent default paths

data.name: Watermark.DefaultCasPool
data.comment: Placeholder for CAS root path

data.name: Watermark.DefaultContent
data.comment: Placeholder for content storage path

data.name: Watermark.ModsExample
data.comment: Example placeholder for mods directory

data.name: Watermark.GitHubRepoExample
data.comment: Example placeholder for GitHub repository

data.name: Description.GamePath
data.value: Specify where you prefer games to be installed. Leave empty for auto-detection.
data.comment: Description for game path setting

data.name: Description.WorkspaceStrategy
data.value: Choose how files are managed in game workspaces
data.comment: Description for workspace strategy setting

data.name: Description.MaxConcurrent
data.value: Limit the number of simultaneous downloads to manage bandwidth usage (1-10)
data.comment: Description for max concurrent downloads setting

data.name: Description.BufferSize
data.value: Buffer size used for file downloads (4KB - 1MB, default: 80KB)
data.comment: Description for buffer size setting

data.name: Description.Timeout
data.value: Timeout for each download operation (10-3600 seconds, default: 600 seconds)
data.comment: Description for timeout setting

data.name: Description.UserAgent
data.value: HTTP User-Agent string sent with download requests
data.comment: Description for user agent setting

data.name: Description.BackgroundDownloads
data.value: Continue downloads when the application is minimized or in the background
data.comment: Description for background downloads setting

data.name: Description.Theme
data.value: Choose between light and dark themes
data.comment: Description for theme setting

data.name: Description.DetailedLogging
data.value: Enable verbose logging for troubleshooting. May impact performance.
data.comment: Description for detailed logging setting

data.name: Description.AutoCheckUpdates
data.value: Automatically check for GenHub updates when the application starts
data.comment: Description for auto check updates setting

data.name: Description.SettingsFilePath
data.value: Specify a custom location for your settings file. Leave empty to use the default location.
data.comment: Description for settings file path setting

data.name: Description.MemoryUsage
data.comment: Description for memory usage display

data.name: Description.CasRootPath
data.value: Directory where deduplicated content is stored. All workspaces reference files from here.
data.comment: Description for CAS root path setting

data.name: Description.MaxCacheSize
data.value: Maximum size for the CAS pool before garbage collection runs (1-1000 GB)
data.comment: Description for max cache size setting

data.name: Description.CasConcurrentOperations
data.value: Number of simultaneous CAS operations (1-16, default: 4)
data.comment: Description for CAS concurrent operations setting

data.name: Description.AutomaticGc
data.value: Automatically clean up unreferenced content to free disk space
data.comment: Description for automatic GC setting

data.name: Description.GcGracePeriod
data.value: How long to keep unreferenced content before deletion (1-365 days)
data.comment: Description for GC grace period setting

data.name: Description.AutoGcInterval
data.value: How often to run automatic garbage collection (1-30 days)
data.comment: Description for auto GC interval setting

data.name: Description.VerifyIntegrity
data.value: Check file hashes to ensure data integrity (recommended, slight performance impact)
data.comment: Description for verify integrity setting

data.name: Description.CachePath
data.value: Override the default cache directory for downloads and temp files.
data.comment: Description for cache path setting

data.name: Description.ContentStoragePath
data.value: Override the default directory where downloaded content is stored permanently.
data.comment: Description for content storage path setting

data.name: Description.ContentDirectories
data.value: Specify directories to scan for local content. One path per line.
data.comment: Description for content directories setting

data.name: Description.GitHubRepositories
data.value: Specify GitHub repositories to scan for releases. One owner/repo per line.
data.comment: Description for GitHub repositories setting

data.name: Hint.SettingsAutoSave
data.value: Settings are automatically saved and will take effect immediately or on next restart as needed.
data.comment: Hint about settings auto-save behavior

data.name: Button.ResetToDefaults
data.comment: Button to reset settings to default values
